comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Wonderful art deco, with the Orient Line giving 'P&O style' a run for its money! The building (or facade) is still there, but the street level windows have changed - Google street view - maps.google.com.au/maps?f=q&source=s_q&hl=en&... Thanks for posting this Orient Line photo - I have a developing interest, having 'found' about 10 photos so far of the original SS Orient in the Tyrrell collection - www.flickr.com/search/?q=SS Orient&w=24785917@N03
